thread.section_title: Luxury Of Watches Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Luxury Of Watches | luxuryofwatches.com
thread.title: kristine pham
thread.title_full: Luxury Of Watches reviewed by kristine pham

author: kristine pham
title: kristine pham
text: The watch I received is absolutely beautiful. It came with an original box and certificate of authenticity is in pamphlet inside the box. The whole process took about a week. This is a second purchase frrom luxury watches and will buy from them again in the future. The first purchase took about three months since they didn't have the watch in stock, which was notified.
